translation.zh: 我们留在气候的地球界限内的 唯一机会在于

translation.zh: 对于约翰来说 这个近在眼前的故事

translation.zh: 我打开报纸 看到了一则新闻

translation.zh: 在整个欧洲 短毛熊峰

translation.zh: 是粮食作物关键的传粉者

translation.zh: 在这里 我们有一个国家 被迫去另一个国家

translation.zh: 偷回一些传粉昆虫

translation.zh: 这是一个…对我个人来说

translation.zh: 那一刻我真正意识到了

translation.zh: 问题的严重性

translation.zh: 全世界约有70％的农作物种类

translation.zh: 在某种程度上依赖昆虫授粉

translation.zh: 但是集约化单一耕作的扩大

translation.zh: 导致了昆虫数量锐减

translation.zh: 讽刺的是 我们的全球粮食生产

translation.zh: 从本质上来说

translation.zh: 是在消灭我们粮食生产所依赖的东西

translation.zh: 这不仅证明了生物多样性研究的

translation.zh: 一个基本原理 那就是我们需要保护生物多样性

translation.zh: 不是因为我们人类这个物种

translation.en: or some kind of moral responsibility from one species, humans,
translation.zh: 需要基于另一个动、植物物种的美 或者某种道德责任

translation.en: to another species like flora and fauna.
translation.zh: 而保护它们

translation.zh: 并不是这样 而是因为 它们是我们社会运转的工具箱

translation.zh: 这是解决谜题的基本要素

translation.en: to make food production, clean air, clean water,
translation.zh: 使食物生产、清洁空气、清洁水源

translation.zh: 碳固存和营养物循环发挥作用

translation.zh: 科学家们试图计算出 昆虫仅仅通过大量的日常活动

translation.en: simply by going about their daily business in large numbers,
translation.zh: 昆虫仅仅通过大量的日常活动 就能带来的好处

translation.en: each kind providing a subtly different service.
translation.zh: 每种都提供了有细微差异的不同服务

translation.en: But their value is mostly incalculable until suddenly…
translation.zh: 但是它们的价值大都不可估量 直到突然之间…

translation.zh: 没有昆虫的星球不是正常运行的星球

translation.en: And, of course, the decline is not just confined to insects.
translation.zh: 当然衰退不只局限在昆虫身上

translation.en: Wildlife has been squeezed out
translation.zh: 随着农业遍及地球上大部分宜居土地

translation.en: as our agriculture has expanded across much of Earth's habitable land.
translation.zh: 随着农业遍及地球上大部分宜居土地 野生动物的生存空间 被挤压得所剩无几

translation.en: Today, of all the birds on Earth, only 30% are wild.
translation.zh: 如今 地球上所有的鸟类中 只有30%是野生的

translation.en: And of all the mammals on the planet,
translation.zh: 这个星球上所有的哺乳动物

translation.en: wild species now make up, by weight, only 4%.
translation.zh: 按重量来计 目前野生物种仅占4%

translation.en: So where is the boundary for biodiversity?
translation.zh: 生物多样性的界限在哪里？

translation.en: How much more of the natural world can we afford to lose
translation.zh: 在我们自己的社会崩塌之前 我们还能承受多少自然界的损失？

translation.en: before our own societies collapse?
translation.zh: 我们还能承受多少自然界的损失？

translation.zh: 自然界中 有很多不同的临界点

translation.en: and it's difficult to translate concretely
translation.zh: 因为生命非常复杂

translation.en: the planetary boundary when it comes to biodiversity,
translation.zh: 当涉及到生物多样性时

translation.en: because life is very complicated.
translation.zh: 很难把地球界限具体化

translation.en: [David] A single boundary for the loss of nature
translation.zh: 因为大自然的复杂性 大自然丧失的单一界限

translation.en: may be hard to pinpoint because of nature's complexity,
translation.zh: 因为大自然的复杂性 大自然丧失的单一界限 可能很难界定

translation.en: but one thing is clear.
translation.zh: 但有一点是明确的

translation.zh: 我们已经越过了这个界限

translation.zh: 我们深陷在赤字之中

translation.zh: 当地球上的物种消失

translation.zh: 地球上的生态系统遭到破坏 我们面临着如此危险的时刻

translation.en: that we have to halt the loss of biodiversity
translation.zh: 我们必须尽快阻止

translation.en: as quickly as we ever can.
translation.zh: 生物多样性的丧失

translation.en: Now is the time to set as a target
translation.zh: 现在要把它设为

translation.en: I mean really at the early parts of this decade,
translation.zh: 在这十年的早期

translation.en: that we must aim at a zero loss of nature.
translation.zh: 我们必须把大自然零损失作为目标

translation.en: The equivalent of 1.5 degrees Celsius maximum allowed warming
translation.zh: 相当于1.5摄氏度的 最大允许升温幅度

translation.zh: 相当于1.5摄氏度的 最大允许升温幅度 将从现在开始将为大自然零损失

translation.en: [David] The third biosphere boundary relates to the planet's bloodstream,
translation.zh: 第三条生物圈界限与行星的命脉有关

translation.en: for fresh water is another of the fundamentals
translation.zh: 因为淡水是社会赖以生存的

translation.zh: 另一个基本要素

translation.zh: 你知不知道你和我

translation.en: something like 3,000 liters of fresh water per person every day for us to stay alive?
translation.zh: 每人每天大概需要3000升淡水 来维持生命吗？

translation.en: And you say, "My God, 3,000 liters? Three tons of water? How can that be?"
translation.zh: 你会说：“天啊 3000升水？ 那就是3吨水？怎么可能？”

translation.en: Yes, we only need 50 liters for hygiene and drinking.
translation.zh: 没错 我们只需要50升水 用于个人卫生和饮用

translation.zh: 在富裕的世界里 我们大概还需要100升

translation.en: for washing, our household needs.
translation.zh: 用于洗涤和家庭需要

translation.en: And then industry needs another 150, so that's like 300 liters.
translation.zh: 还需要150升用于工业 这些大约是300升

translation.en: But the rest, the 2,500 or so, is for food.
translation.zh: 但是剩下的2500多升用在了食物上

translation.zh: 当我们吃食物时 我们需要淡水来生产

translation.en: when we eat our food.
translation.zh: 盘子里的一切东西

translation.en: [David] Fresh water has a special significance for Johan.
translation.zh: 淡水对约翰有特殊的意义

translation.en: It was the subject of his PhD
translation.zh: 这是他攻读博士学位

translation.en: and many years of research in the semi-arid regions of Africa.
translation.zh: 以及在非洲半干旱地区 进行多年研究的课题

translation.en: I spent from, you know, sunrise to sunset walking around, sweating like crazy,
translation.zh: 我从日出到日落 走来走去 汗流浃背

translation.en: collecting data, you know.
translation.zh: 收集数据

translation.en: Digging profiles in the soil,
translation.zh: 挖掘土壤剖面

translation.en: taking soil samples, doing soil moisture measurements.
translation.zh: 采集土壤样本 并进行土壤水分测量

translation.en: Just getting wind speed data and rainfall data.
translation.zh: 获取风速数据和降雨量数据

translation.en: I've measured so much leaf area. You don't, you won't imagine, you know,
translation.zh: 我测量过很多叶片面积 你都无法想象

translation.zh: 科学家以平方毫米为单位 测量一株植物上所有叶片的尺寸

translation.en: the size of all the leaves on a plant.
translation.zh: 会有多么小心

translation.en: [David] It was the details he needed to answer a much bigger question.
translation.zh: 他需要这些细节来回答更大的问题

translation.en: How much water do we need to feed the world?
translation.zh: 那就是 我们需要多少水来养活这个世界？

translation.en: My tentative answer when I was doing my MSc was,
translation.zh: 我在读理科硕士时的初步回答是

translation.en: was that, "Yes, there seemed to be enough water."
translation.zh: “没错 那里似乎有足够的水”

translation.en: [David] But there's another side to the coin.
translation.zh: 但是 凡事都有两面性

translation.zh: 淡水的使用是否有整体阈值

translation.en: beyond which the system starts to collapse?
translation.zh: 超过这个阈值系统就会开始崩塌？

translation.zh: 我们扫描了世界上所有的流域

translation.en: and then, you know, defining what's the minimum amount of runoff water
translation.zh: 然后 定义了任何特定流域 为维持系统的湿润度

translation.en: any given river basin must have to maintain the wetness in the system
translation.zh: 为维持系统的湿润度 所必备的最低径流水量

translation.en: so that you have thriving ecosystems,
translation.zh: 这样就会得到蓬勃发展的生态系统

translation.en: good supply of water, functioning river basins.
translation.zh: 充足的水源充足以及良好运作的水域

translation.en: [David] The volume of water currently being extracted from each river
translation.zh: 目前 从每条河中抽取的水量

translation.en: reveals why many are now in danger of running dry.
translation.zh: 揭示了为什么现在 很多河流有干涸的危险

translation.en: [Johan] Globally, we're still, as far as our assessment shows today,
translation.zh: 在全球范围内 就我们如今的评估来看

translation.en: in the safe zone on fresh water,
translation.zh: 我们依然处于淡水安全区域

translation.en: but we're rapidly moving towards a danger zone.
translation.zh: 但是我们正迅速向危险区域移动

translation.en: [David] The last of the biosphere boundaries
translation.zh: 最后一条生物圈界限

translation.zh: 涉及到营养物、氮和磷的流动

translation.en: They are the essential components of all living things,
translation.zh: 它们是所有生物的基本组成部分

translation.en: the key ingredients in fertilizers.
translation.zh: 也是肥料的关键成分

translation.en: Johan has witnessed firsthand the impacts of their increasing use.
translation.zh: 约翰亲眼目睹了 增加使用量带来的影响

translation.zh: 他在波罗的海的一个小岛上 度过了童年的夏天

translation.en: [Johan] We loved fishing.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢钓鱼

translation.en: Most often, I fished with my closest friend here, Anders,
translation.zh: 我经常跟我最亲密的朋友安德斯

translation.en: and my little brother Nicklaus. And…
translation.zh: 还有我弟弟尼克劳斯一起钓鱼 而且…

translation.en: So there was often the three of us.
translation.zh: 所以我们三个几乎经常

translation.en: Almost being able to tell my mother and dad that,
translation.zh: 问我父母

translation.en: "So you want some fish for dinner?"
translation.zh: “晚餐你想吃点鱼吗？”

translation.en: and we would come home with a catch, basically.
translation.zh: 基本上我们回家时都会有收获

translation.en: One of the adventures was going out
translation.zh: 其中一次冒险

translation.en: one, two nautical miles out in the open Baltic,
translation.zh: 是在开阔的波罗的海一、二海里之外

translation.en: and that's where we could, by hand, fishing cod.
translation.zh: 我们可以在那里徒手抓鳕鱼

translation.zh: 我当时最擅长洗鱼

translation.zh: 一小时后 我不得不放弃钓鱼

translation.zh: 因为我们捕到特别多鳕鱼

translation.zh: 把它们带回家的唯一办法 是在现场杀鱼

translation.en: So we would have the seagulls just engulfing us,
translation.zh: 海鸥都快把我们吞没了

translation.en: because there was so much, er, you know, entrails
translation.zh: 因为有那么多

translation.en: and then pieces of fish that I was then cutting off
translation.zh: 内脏和鱼块 我会把它们切下来

translation.en: just to fit in the boat.
translation.zh: 装进船中

translation.en: And that was a cause of great, great excitement as a kid to do that.
translation.zh: 作为小孩子 这样做是非常兴奋的

translation.en: A few decades later, today, it's a completely different situation,
translation.zh: 几十年后的今天 情况完全不同了

translation.en: and you see nobody trying to go out to catch cod,
translation.zh: 你会发现 没有人去捕鳕鱼

translation.en: because, er, it's just literally empty.
translation.zh: 因为它们在这儿几乎绝迹了

translation.en: It looks exactly the same, by the way, as it did in the 1970s, 1980s
translation.zh: 顺便说一句 当你从上面看时 它看起来与20世纪70、80年代

translation.en: when you look at it from above,
translation.zh: 完全一样

translation.en: but when you look at it from below, it's something completely different.
translation.zh: 但是如果你从下面看时 它就完全不同了

translation.en: [David] When Johan was a boy, the Baltic was a healthy environment
translation.zh: 在约翰小时候 波罗的海 是以鳕鱼等掠食性鱼类为主的

translation.en: dominated by predatory fish like cod.
translation.zh: 健康环境

translation.en: But while overfishing removed many of the fish,
translation.zh: 但是虽然过度捕捞导致许多鱼类死亡

translation.en: it was fertilizers washed off the surrounding fields
translation.zh: 正是从周围农田冲刷下来的肥料

translation.en: that tipped the Baltic into disaster.
translation.zh: 使波罗的海陷入了灾难

translation.en: It's now the world's most polluted sea.
translation.zh: 它现在是世界上污染最严重的海洋

translation.en: [Johan] It is when you have many Baltic Sea equivalents across the planet
translation.zh: 当这个星球上有很多 跟波罗的海类似的地方时

translation.en: that there is reason for deep concern,
translation.zh: 我们有理由深切关注

translation.en: because it's a…
translation.zh: 因为这是个信号

translation.en: It's a signal that the entire planet is gradually losing its resilience
translation.zh: 因为这是个信号 表明整个星球 正在失去恢复能力 而且渐渐变得越来越弱

translation.en: and gradually becoming weaker and weaker.
translation.zh: 正在失去恢复能力 而且渐渐变得越来越弱

translation.en: [David] Elena Bennett is an expert on the impacts of fertilizers.
translation.zh: 埃琳娜贝内特是研究肥料影响的专家

translation.en: We take nitrogen out of the air and chemically convert it
translation.zh: 我们从空气中提取氮气 通过化学方法

translation.en: into a form that is able to be used by plants,
translation.zh: 将其转化为能被植物利用的形式

translation.en: or, in the case of phosphorus, we dig it up out of the ground.
translation.zh: 或者 就磷而言 我们把它从地下挖出来

translation.en: We mine it.
translation.zh: 我们把它开采出来

translation.en: We developed these chemical pathways or ways to mine phosphorus
translation.zh: 我们开发了化学途径或方法 对磷进行开采

translation.en: that were much, much more efficient,
translation.zh: 这些是更有效的做法

translation.en: and that basically doubled, tripled,
translation.zh: 基本上使世界各地

translation.en: or even quadrupled the production of food around the world.
translation.zh: 食物生产增加了 两倍、三倍 甚至四倍

translation.en: [David] This was invaluable in feeding a growing population,
translation.zh: 这对养活不断增长的人口 是非常宝贵的

translation.en: but we got into the habit of applying far more fertilizer
translation.zh: 但我们养成了施用更多肥料的习惯

translation.en: than the crops could actually use.
translation.zh: 这远远多于作物实际的施用量

translation.en: The unused nutrients wash into rivers,
translation.zh: 未使用的营养物质被冲入河流

translation.en: over-fertilizing them too.
translation.zh: 使得河流也过量施肥

translation.en: A process called eutrophication.
translation.zh: 这个过程称为“富营养化”

translation.en: What we see are these algal blooms.
translation.zh: 我们看到的是这些藻华

translation.en: Sort of looks like a blue-green scum on top of the lake.
translation.zh: 它看起来像是湖顶上的蓝绿色浮渣

translation.en: They often smell terrible
translation.zh: 它们的气味通常很难闻

translation.en: because we're smelling the rotting of that algae.
translation.zh: 因为我们闻到的是藻类腐烂的味道

translation.en: As it's decomposing, it uses up oxygen.
translation.zh: 它在腐烂时会消耗氧气

translation.en: [David] Reduced oxygen changes the chemical composition
translation.zh: 减少的氧气会改变了

translation.en: of the sediment on the bottom of the lake, causing it to release more phosphorus.
translation.zh: 湖底沉积物的化学成分 导致它释放出更多的磷

translation.en: [Elena] Soon as you have a eutrophication problem, the lake sort of says,
translation.zh: 一旦出现了富营养化问题 湖水会这样想

translation.en: "Oh good, we're gonna make it worse,"
translation.zh: “很好 我们会把情况弄得更糟”

translation.en: and it just creates a positive feedback cycle
translation.zh: 它就创造了一个正反馈循环

translation.en: that creates more and more and more phosphorus
translation.zh: 这会产生越来越多的磷

translation.en: going into that lake and essentially keeps it in that state.
translation.zh: 进入湖中 并从根本上使其保持这种状态

translation.en: We also have the same issue of eutrophication in oceans,
translation.zh: 我们在海洋中 也有同样的富营养化问题

translation.en: where we get what are called dead zones from the same nutrients,
translation.zh: 我们从同样的营养物质中 得到所谓的死亡区

translation.en: and we see those dead zones now
translation.zh: 在全世界几百个地方

translation.en: in a few hundred places around the world.
translation.zh: 都能看到死亡区

translation.en: [David] Eutrophication in the ocean may have been an important contributor
translation.zh: 海洋中的富营养化可能是导致世界上

translation.en: to one of the world's five previous mass extinction events.
translation.zh: 前五次大灭绝事件之一的重要因素

translation.en: Already today, some dead zones have expanded
translation.zh: 如今 一些死亡区已经扩大到

translation.en: to cover tens of thousands of square kilometers.
translation.zh: 覆盖数万平方公里

translation.en: Our overuse of phosphorus and nitrogen
translation.zh: 我们对磷和氮的过度使用

translation.en: is one of the least known, but most critical impacts
translation.zh: 是我们对生物圈造成的最不为人知

translation.en: we're having on the biosphere.
translation.zh: 但又最关键的影响之一

translation.en: We are already deep into the danger zone.
translation.zh: 我们已经深陷危险区域了

translation.en: [Elena] We are well across the nutrient boundary.
translation.zh: 我们已经越过营养物质界限了

translation.en: It's… It's not a thing that we think about very often.
translation.zh: 这不是我们会经常想到的事

translation.en: I think we need to be taking this boundary much more seriously than we currently are.
translation.zh: 我认为我们需要比现在 更加认真地对待这个边界

translation.en: [David] Nutrients, water, our forests, biodiversity, and the climate.
translation.zh: 营养物质、水、我们的森林 生物多样性和气候

translation.en: Five big components of our planet that regulate stability
translation.zh: 是我们的星球调节稳定性 以及支撑我们自身生存的

translation.en: and underpin our own survival.
translation.zh: 五大要素

translation.en: But Johan and his colleagues knew that this still wasn't the full picture.
translation.zh: 但是约翰和他的同事 知道这还不是全部

translation.en: They hadn't yet accounted for a little-known drama
translation.zh: 他们还没有考虑到正在海洋中上演的

translation.en: that's playing out in the oceans.
translation.zh: 一场鲜为人知的戏剧性事件

translation.en: Its impact on our planet's stability could outplay all others.
translation.zh: 它对我们星球稳定性的影响 可能会超过所有其它影响

translation.en: When we emit CO2 into the atmosphere,
translation.zh: 当我们把二氧化碳排入大气时

translation.en: about a third of that emissions has ended up in the ocean.
translation.zh: 大约三分之一最终进入了海洋

translation.en: [David] Terry Hughes has been a close collaborator with Johan
translation.zh: 特里休斯多年来 一直与约翰密切合作

translation.en: over many years.
translation.zh: 一直与约翰密切合作

translation.en: [Terry] That has changed the chemistry of the ocean.
translation.zh: 这已经改变了海洋的化学成分

translation.en: It has changed the pH
translation.zh: 它已经改变了酸碱度

translation.en: and made it less alkaline, or more acidic.
translation.zh: 使其碱性降低或酸性增强

translation.en: Hence the name "ocean acidification."
translation.zh: 因此被称为 "海洋酸化"

translation.en: [David] When carbon dioxide dissolves in water,
translation.zh: 当二氧化碳在水中溶解时

translation.en: it creates carbonic acid.
translation.zh: 产生了碳酸

translation.en: [Terry] The vulnerability is in colder waters.
translation.zh: 较冷的水域有其脆弱性

translation.en: [David] Over the past few decades,
translation.zh: 在过去的几十年间

translation.en: the world's ocean has become 26% more acidic,
translation.zh: 世界海洋的酸度增加了26％

translation.en: and, for as long as carbon dioxide concentrations
translation.zh: 只要大气中的二氧化碳

translation.en: in the atmosphere remain high,
translation.zh: 浓度依然很高

translation.en: the ocean will continue acidifying.
translation.zh: 海洋就会继续酸化

translation.en: The acid reacts with chemicals in the water called carbonate ions,
translation.zh: 酸与水中被称为碳酸离子的 化学物质发生反应

translation.en: reducing their concentration.
translation.zh: 降低它们的浓度

translation.en: [Terry] It affects a broad suite of organisms,
translation.zh: 它会影响到各种各样的生物体

translation.en: particularly those that need
translation.zh: 特别是那些需要碳酸盐

translation.en: carbonate to grow their skeletons.
translation.zh: 让骨骼生长的生物体

translation.en: Things like mollusks, oysters, mussels.
translation.zh: 像是软体动物、牡蛎和蚌类

translation.en: [David] Ocean acidification has an ominous history.
translation.zh: 海洋酸化有一段不祥的历史

translation.en: Global changes in the acidification,
translation.zh: 海洋酸化和酸碱度的

translation.en: the pH of the ocean, can actually cause mass extinctions.
translation.zh: 全球性变化实际上 会导致大规模物种灭绝

translation.en: We've seen that repeatedly in the geological record.
translation.zh: 我们在地质记录中 多次看到了这种情况

translation.en: So as we manipulate
translation.zh: 因此 当我们在操纵

translation.en: the planet's climate, we're literally playing with fire
translation.zh: 这个星球的气候时 我们实际上是在玩火

translation.en: in terms of the unforeseen consequences
translation.zh: 因为越过这些地球界限

translation.en: of moving past these planetary boundaries into uncharted territory.
translation.zh: 进入未知的领域 会造成不可预见的后果

translation.en: [David] We are still in the safe zone for ocean acidification,
translation.zh: 我们仍然处于海洋酸化的安全区域

translation.en: but we're pushing towards the danger zone
translation.zh: 但是我们正在向危险区域推进

translation.en: and potentially a catastrophic mass extinction.
translation.zh: 并有可能发生灾难性的大规模灭绝

translation.en: For all the complexities of Earth,
translation.zh: 对于地球上所有的复杂情况

translation.en: Johan and his colleagues discovered that there are just nine systems
translation.zh: 约翰和他的同事发现 只有九个系统

translation.en: that keep our planet stable.
translation.zh: 能让我们的星球维持稳定

translation.en: But they've not yet identified where the boundaries lie for two of them.
translation.zh: 但是他们还没有确定 这两者之间的界限在哪里

translation.en: The first one is an assortment of human-made pollutants.
translation.zh: 第一个是人为制造的各种污染物

translation.en: We call it "novel entities," and it is everything from nuclear waste
translation.zh: 我们称之为“ 新实体” 涵盖的东西应有尽有 核废料到持久性有机污染物

translation.en: to persistent organic pollutants
translation.zh: 核废料到持久性有机污染物

translation.en: to loading of heavy metals
translation.zh: 到重金属含量

translation.en: to microplastics.
translation.zh: 再到微塑料

translation.en: [David] Humans have created 100,000 new materials,
translation.zh: 人类创造了10万种新材料

translation.en: any number of which could interact with the environment in catastrophic ways.
translation.zh: 其中任何一种都可能 以灾难性的方式与环境相互影响

translation.en: As of yet, this boundary is not quantified.
translation.zh: 到目前为止 这个界限还没有被量化

translation.en: We simply don't know the long-term or cumulative impacts
translation.zh: 我们只是不知道 这些污染物质的长期或累积性影响

translation.en: of these polluting substances.
translation.zh: 这些污染物质的长期或累积性影响

translation.en: But most have the potential to cause planet-wide disruption
translation.zh: 但如果不以某种方式加以控制

translation.en: if not controlled in some way.
translation.zh: 大多数都可能造成全球范围内的破坏

translation.en: There's one form of pollutant that is already having a global impact.
translation.zh: 有一种形式的污染物 已经对全球造成了影响

translation.en: So much so that it has a boundary of its own.
translation.zh: 以致于它有了自己的界限

translation.en: Aerosols are basically particles in the atmosphere.
translation.zh: 气溶胶基本上是大气中的颗粒物

translation.en: They are what's called air pollution particulates.
translation.zh: 它们就是所谓的空气污染颗粒物 （气溶胶）

translation.en: 75% of the aerosol pollution is from fossil fuel combustion.
translation.zh: 75％的气溶胶污染来自化石燃料燃烧

translation.en: We see them as hazy sky,
translation.zh: 我们把它们看成是朦胧的天空

translation.en: because they intercept sunlight and just scatter it like mirrors.
translation.zh: 因为它们拦截阳光 然后像镜子一样把阳光散射开来

translation.en: And they cause what's called "global dimming."
translation.zh: 它们造成了所谓的"全球变暗现象"

translation.en: [David] Veerabhadran has spent a lifetime studying the air around and above us.
translation.zh: 维拉布哈德兰一生都在研究 我们周围和上方的空气

translation.en: The other way aerosols impact climate,
translation.zh: 气溶胶对气候影响的另一种方式

translation.en: because you're cutting sunlight, which is the major energy source
translation.zh: 因为你在阻断阳光 这个驱动地球温度的

translation.en: for driving the temperature of the planet, these aerosols have caused some cooling.
translation.zh: 主要能源 而这些气溶胶造成了一些降温

translation.en: When you hear climate scientists like me say that aerosols are cooling the planet
translation.zh: 当你听到像我这样的气候科学家说 气溶胶正在给这个星球降温

translation.en: and mask the warming, you may think, "That's a good thing."
translation.zh: 并且掩盖了升温 你可能会想：“这是件好事”

translation.en: But unfortunately, it's not.
translation.zh: 但不幸的是 这不是件好事

translation.en: Because of this masking,
translation.zh: 因为这种掩盖

translation.en: we are still not seeing the full greenhouse beast.
translation.zh: 我们依然没有看到温室怪兽的全貌

translation.en: [David] This cooling effect from aerosols is masking
translation.zh: 气溶胶的冷却效应正在掩盖

translation.en: about 40% of the effects of global warming.
translation.zh: 气溶胶的冷却效应正在掩盖 全球变暖约40%的影响

translation.en: And it comes at a high price.
translation.zh: 而这需要付出高昂的代价

translation.en: Air pollution kills over seven million people every year
translation.zh: 空气污染每年造成700多万人死亡

translation.en: and takes, on average, three years off the life expectancy of each one of us.
translation.zh: 并让我们所有人的平均预期寿命 减少三年

translation.en: Where the boundary for air pollution lies has not yet been scientifically determined.
translation.zh: 空气污染的界限还没有科学判定

translation.en: Just based on the 7.5 million deaths by these particles,
translation.zh: 仅仅根据这些颗粒物 造成750万人死亡这个事实 可以说

translation.en: I would say we have already crossed the boundary
translation.zh: 造成750万人死亡这个事实 可以说 我们已经越过了气溶胶的界限

translation.en: as far as aerosols are concerned.
translation.zh: 我们已经越过了气溶胶的界限

translation.en: [David] Finally, the ninth boundary is the ozone layer.
translation.zh: 最后 第九条界限是臭氧层

translation.en: It has the unique distinction of being the only boundary
translation.zh: 它的独特之处在于 它是我们朝着

translation.en: where we're moving in the right direction.
translation.zh: 正确方向前进的唯一界限

translation.en: [Veerabhadran] The ozone intercepts harmful ultraviolet radiation,
translation.zh: 臭氧会拦截有害的紫外线辐射 紫外线辐射会直接影响

translation.en: which directly impacts our DNA
translation.zh: 紫外线辐射会直接影响 我们的DNA 并导致诸如皮肤癌的致命疾病

translation.en: and causes deadly diseases like skin cancer.
translation.zh: 我们的DNA 并导致诸如皮肤癌的致命疾病

translation.en: That is why,
translation.zh: 这就是为什么20世纪80年代

translation.en: when the Antarctic ozone hole was discovered in the 1980s,
translation.zh: 这就是为什么20世纪80年代 在南极洲发现臭氧层空洞时

translation.en: there was a global panic.
translation.zh: 出现了全球性的恐慌

translation.en: [David] The discovery of the ozone hole
translation.zh: 臭氧层空洞

translation.en: caused by chemical pollutants being released into the atmosphere
translation.zh: 是由释放到大气中的 化学污染物造成的

translation.en: persuaded nations to phase out these chemicals.
translation.zh: 这一发现说服 各国逐步淘汰了这些化学品

translation.en: [Johan] It was quite fantastic how the scientific warnings
translation.zh: 把科学警告转化为政治行动

translation.en: translated into political action.
translation.zh: 真的很神奇

translation.en: This is the first and only example
translation.zh: 这是第一个 也是唯一一个例子

translation.en: that we can actually manage the whole planet.
translation.zh: 证明我们可以真正管理好整个星球

translation.en: We can actually return into a safe operating space
translation.zh: 我们实际上可以回到 地球界限的安全运行空间

translation.en: for a planetary boundary that we had seriously gone into the high-risk zone,
translation.zh: 因为我们真的已经 进入了高风险区

translation.en: and we returned back into a safe operating space.
translation.zh: 然后我们又回到了安全运行空间

translation.en: It was indeed fantastic to witness.
translation.zh: 这的确是神奇的见证

translation.en: Scientists raised the alarm, and the world acted.
translation.zh: 科学家们发出了警报 而世界也采取了行动

translation.en: Thanks to Johan and his colleagues,
translation.zh: 感谢约翰与他的同事

translation.en: we now know the planet has nine boundaries
translation.zh: 我们现在知道这个星球有九条界限

translation.en: and the risks we face by crossing them.
translation.zh: 以及我们越过它们所面临的风险

translation.en: Together with the ozone layer, we are, at least for now,
translation.zh: 加上臭氧层 我们至少现在

translation.en: within the safe zone for ocean acidification and fresh water.
translation.zh: 处于海洋酸化和淡水的安全区域内

translation.en: We don't yet know how close we are to the danger zone for air pollution,
translation.zh: 我们还不知道距离空气污染 或所有其它污染物 这些新型实体的危险区域有多远

translation.en: or for all the other pollutants, the novel entities.
translation.zh: 这些新型实体的危险区域有多远

translation.en: But most worryingly, we have already exceeded
translation.zh: 但是最令人担心的是 我们已经越过了

translation.en: at least four of the nine boundaries.
translation.zh: 九条界限中至少四条

translation.en: Climate, forest loss, nutrients, and biodiversity.
translation.zh: 它们是气候、森林流失 营养物质和生物多样性

translation.en: We are now crossing irreversible tipping points,
translation.zh: 我们现在正在越过不可逆转的临界点

translation.en: and we are perilously close to tipping the Earth
translation.zh: 我们正在冒着危险接近 让地球进入无法支持

translation.en: into a state that is unable to support our own civilizations.
translation.zh: 我们正在冒着危险接近 让地球进入无法支持 我们自身文明的状态

translation.en: What we're seeing in the world today verifies the planetary boundary framework.
translation.zh: 我们今天所看到的 证实了地球界限框架

translation.en: We can see so clear evidence that,
translation.zh: 我们可以看到很明显的证据

translation.en: because we're in the danger zone on climate,
translation.zh: 因为我们处在气候的危险区域

translation.en: because we're in the deep high-risk zone on biodiversity loss,
translation.zh: 因为我们处在生物多样性丧失的 深度高危区

translation.en: we start seeing increased drought, impacts on the rain forest,
translation.zh: 我们开始看到日益增多的旱灾 对雨林的影响

translation.en: the forest fires in Australia and in the Amazon,
translation.zh: 澳大利亚与亚马逊的森林火灾

translation.en: the accelerated ice melt, the collapse of coral reef systems.
translation.zh: 加速的冰层消融 以及珊瑚礁系统的崩塌

translation.en: [David] For the scientists bearing witness to these planetary changes,
translation.zh: 对于见证地球这些变化的科学家而言

translation.en: the loss is much more than just numbers.
translation.zh: 损失的不仅仅只是数字

translation.en: Terry Hughes has spent a lifetime studying coral reefs.
translation.zh: 特里休斯一生致力于研究珊瑚礁

translation.en: [Terry] A bleached coral is very, very sick.
translation.zh: 白化的珊瑚病得很厉害

translation.en: [David] Corals bleach when the waters around them get too warm,
translation.zh: 当珊瑚周围的水温过高时 就会发生白化现象

translation.en: something that's happening with increasing frequency and intensity
translation.zh: 作为全球变暖的结果

translation.en: as a consequence of global warming.
translation.zh: 这种情况发生的频率和强度与日俱增

translation.en: In big thermal extremes, like we've been seeing
translation.zh: 在极端高温下 就像我们最近几十年

translation.en: during mass bleaching events in recent decades,
translation.zh: 在大规模白化事件中看到的那样

translation.en: they can actually die very, very quickly.
translation.zh: 它们会很快死去

translation.en: They cook.
translation.zh: 它们遭到了高温破坏

translation.en: The footprint of a bleaching event is ten times bigger
translation.zh: 白化事件的足迹比最极端的第五类

translation.en: than the most extreme Category 5 tropical cyclone.
translation.zh: 白化事件的足迹比最极端的第五类 热带气旋大十倍

translation.en: So they're off the scale in terms of the size of the impact,
translation.zh: 所以就影响的大小和发生的频率而言

translation.en: and in terms of how frequently they are occurring.
translation.zh: 它们已经超出了设定范围

translation.en: [David] Terry studies the Great Barrier Reef,
translation.zh: 特里对世界上最大的珊瑚礁系统

translation.en: the largest reef system in the world.
translation.zh: 大堡礁进行了研究

translation.en: Bleaching events used to be localized and rare,
translation.zh: 白化事件曾经是局部性的 而且很罕见

translation.en: but over the past two decades,
translation.zh: 但是在过去的20年间

translation.en: marine heatwaves have caused widespread bleaching.
translation.zh: 海洋热浪造成了广泛的白化现象

translation.en: Three of the five biggest bleaching events have occurred in the past five years.
translation.zh: 在过去五年里 发生了五起最大白化事件中的三起

translation.en: [Terry] We're worried about that shrinking gap
translation.zh: 我们对两次白化事件之间

translation.en: between one bleaching event and the next one.
translation.zh: 不断缩小的间隔深感忧虑

translation.en: We've already seen back-to-back bleaching events
translation.zh: 我们已经看到大堡礁 在2016和2017年

translation.en: occur for the first time on the Great Barrier Reef
translation.zh: 连续两个夏天 第一次发生了

translation.en: in two consecutive summers in 2016 and 2017.
translation.zh: 连续白化事件

translation.en: [David] Those gaps are critically important if the corals are to recover.
translation.zh: 那些间隔对珊瑚的恢复非常重要

translation.en: Half the reef's corals have already died.
translation.zh: 珊瑚礁的一半珊瑚已经死亡

translation.en: Terry's work involves conducting aerial surveys
translation.zh: 特里的工作包括进行航空测量

translation.en: to record the extent of each bleaching event.
translation.zh: 记录每次白化事件的程度

translation.en: [Terry] When we do our aerial surveys, we fly as slowly as we can,
translation.zh: 当我们进行航空测量时 我们尽可能飞得很慢

translation.en: as low as we can, so we can see individual corals,
translation.zh: 也尽可能飞得很低 这样我们就能看到单个珊瑚

translation.en: and we can assess how many of them are bleached white or not.
translation.zh: 也尽可能飞得很低 这样我们就能看到单个珊瑚 我们可以评估其中 有多少白化或未白化的珊瑚

translation.en: [Terry] All the coral's bleached.
translation.zh: 所有珊瑚均已白化

translation.en: [man] Yeah, that's bad.
translation.zh: 是的 很糟糕

translation.en: [Terry] You can actually see a bleached reef from kilometers away,
translation.zh: 你可以在几公里外 看到一片白化的珊瑚礁

translation.en: because it virtually glows. There's so much white coral on it.
translation.zh: 因为它会发光 上面有很多白色的珊瑚

translation.en: [Terry] So I've got very broad crest, and just about everything's bleached.
translation.zh: 我在非常开阔的高处 看到几乎所有珊瑚都白化了

translation.en: Those surveys have now been done five times,
translation.zh: 现在那些测量已经进行了五次

translation.en: and I have led three of those.
translation.zh: 我领导了其中的三次

translation.en: The last three in 2016, 2017, and 2020.
translation.zh: 最后三次是在2016年 2017年和2020年进行的

translation.en: It's, um… It's a job I'd hoped I'd never have to do,
translation.zh: 这是我希望自己永远不必做的工作

translation.en: because it's actually, um, very confronting.
translation.zh: 因为威胁近在眼前

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: [David] We're heading for a future in which the Great Barrier Reef
translation.zh: 我们正在走向 大堡礁成为

translation.en: is a coral graveyard.
translation.zh: 珊瑚墓场的未来

translation.en: [Terry] The climate modelers are telling us, the biologists,
translation.zh: 气候模型专家告诉我们 这些生物学家

translation.en: that business-as-usual carbon emissions
translation.zh: 一切照旧的碳排放

translation.en: will result in back-to-back bleaching events
translation.zh: 到本世纪末 将会导致在每个连续的夏天

translation.en: every consecutive summer by the end of this century.
translation.zh: 发生连续的白化事件

translation.en: We've gone past the tipping point for coral bleaching.
translation.zh: 我们已经越过了珊瑚白化的临界点

translation.en: Scientists and ecologists like myself
translation.zh: 像我这样的科学家和生态学家

translation.en: have been talking for decades now about global warming,
translation.zh: 几十年来一直在谈论全球变暖的问题

translation.en: and it has been frustrating, um, that we haven't been listened to.
translation.zh: 令人沮丧的是 我们的意见未被听取

translation.zh: 澳大利亚的森林大火 已经持续了几个月

translation.zh: 摧毁了东海岸的大部分地区…

translation.zh: 2020年 澳大利亚经历了 地狱一样的夏天

translation.zh: 我们现在唯一的出路就是

translation.en: a treacherous gauntlet of fallen trees and flames.
translation.zh: 倒下的树木与火焰构成的险恶之境

translation.zh: 在破纪录的温度和 数月严重旱灾的刺激下

translation.zh: 3亿亩的土地被焚毁

translation.zh: 丹妮艾拉泰谢拉研究辉凤头鹦鹉

translation.zh: 这是澳大利亚最脆弱的一种鸟类

translation.zh: 辉凤头鹦鹉让你真正接近它们

translation.zh: 它们会知道你是谁 而且会去你经常去的地方

translation.zh: 我想 它们实际上知道你是谁

translation.zh: 所以你可以上前去找它们

translation.zh: 所以你可以上前去找它们 坐在它们觅食的树下 去认识它们中的每一位

translation.zh: 坐在它们觅食的树下 去认识它们中的每一位

translation.zh: 当这样做安全时

translation.zh: 丹妮艾拉回到了 她在南澳大利亚袋鼠岛上的

translation.zh: 一个主要研究点

translation.zh: 现在是二月 是凤头鹦鹉的筑巢期

translation.zh: 根本就没有任何野生动物的踪迹

translation.zh: 这里什么都没有了

translation.zh: 看起来就像是

translation.zh: 经历了大屠杀

translation.zh: 就好像眼前并非我认识的地方

translation.zh: 因为这里已经满目疮痍

translation.zh: 感觉不可能是同一个地方

translation.zh: 我在过去的四年中

translation.zh: 我在过去的四年中 一直在这个地方工作 这是关于…

translation.zh: 一直在这个地方工作 这是关于…

translation.zh: 这种情况已经艰难到极致了 这里真的是…

translation.zh: 本来每天晚上都很热闹

translation.en: We would have had young chicks by this point.
translation.zh: 这时我们本该有雏鸟了

translation.en: This is… This is heartbreaking.
translation.zh: 这真是令人心碎

translation.zh: 天啊

translation.zh: 我很了解

translation.zh: 这个巢穴

translation.zh: 看到它变成这样真的像是噩梦

translation.zh: 唯一剩下的就只是

translation.zh: 唯一剩下的就只是 扔在地上被烧毁的铁圈

translation.en: Like, the iron collar is…
translation.zh: 铁圈

translation.en: Is what we put on the nest trees to save them.
translation.zh: 是我们放在它们筑巢的树上 用来保护它们的

translation.en: To stop the possums
translation.zh: 为了阻止负鼠

translation.en: from… From predating on the chicks.
translation.zh: 攻击雏鸟

translation.zh: 看看我周围这些铁圈

translation.en: open on the ground.
translation.zh: 它们就这样散落在地上

translation.en: You know, they weren't enough to save them.
translation.zh: 这些铁圈还不足以拯救它们

translation.en: This is an ecological catastrophe. There's no doubt about it.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 这是一场生态灾难

translation.en: [David] The 2020 bushfires
translation.zh: 2020年的森林大火是澳大利亚历史上

translation.en: were the most devastating in Australia's history.
translation.zh: 2020年的森林大火是澳大利亚历史上 最严重的一次

translation.en: [Daniella] Climate scientists have been talking about these events
translation.zh: 长期以来 气候科学家一直在讨论

translation.en: for a long time,
translation.zh: 这些事件… （丹妮艾拉泰谢拉博士 昆士兰大学）

translation.en: and we were expecting that this might happen,
translation.zh: （丹妮艾拉泰谢拉博士 昆士兰大学） …我们原本以为这可能会发生

translation.en: but I don't think anybody expected it to be so soon
translation.zh: 但我认为没有人会想到 它会发生得如此快

translation.en: or so severe.
translation.zh: 或者说如此严重

translation.en: [David] Scientists estimate that the fires killed or displaced three billion animals.
translation.zh: 科学家估计 这场大火造成30亿只动物 死亡或流离失所

translation.en: [Daniella] 1.43 million mammals,
translation.zh: 其中包括143万只哺乳动物

translation.en: 2.46 billion reptiles,
translation.zh: 24.6亿条爬行动物

translation.en: 180 million birds,
translation.zh: 1.8亿只鸟

translation.en: and 51 million frogs.
translation.zh: 还有5100万只青蛙

translation.en: These figures are so enormous,
translation.zh: 这些数字如此庞大

translation.en: so consequential…
translation.zh: 也如此重要

translation.en: I don't know how to make sense of them.
translation.zh: 我不知道该如何理解它们

translation.en: That's not what we should be dealing with as conservationists.
translation.zh: 这不是我们作为环保主义者 应该面对的问题

translation.en: I think this is a wake-up call.
translation.zh: 我想这是个警钟

translation.en: These black summer fires really showed us that it's now,
translation.zh: 这些黑色的夏日之火真的向我们展示

translation.en: it's affecting us today,
translation.zh: 现在它正影响着我们

translation.en: and this is gonna have long-lasting consequences.
translation.zh: 而且会造成持久的后果

translation.en: Like, where can he go?
translation.zh: 它又能去哪里？

translation.en: [David] Wildfires and coral bleaching are caused by us overstepping the climate boundary.
translation.zh: 森林大火和珊瑚白化是由于 我们越过了气候界限造成的

translation.en: But it is the destruction of nature that lies behind what has been by far
translation.zh: 但是正是对大自然的破坏 才是我们这个不稳定的星球

translation.en: the most far-reaching impact of our destabilizing planet.
translation.zh: 迄今为止最深远的影响

translation.en: The COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.zh: 2019冠状病毒病大流行

translation.en: It affected your life as it affected mine.
translation.zh: 影响了你我的生活

translation.en: COVID-19 was a planetary impact we were ill-equipped to deal with.
translation.zh: 2019冠状病毒病 是我们对于这个星球无法应对的影响

translation.en: It overwhelmed health services
translation.zh: 它令卫生服务不堪重负

translation.en: and brought the global economy to its knees.
translation.zh: 并使全球经济陷入瘫痪

translation.en: Though it surprised many,
translation.zh: 虽然让很多人感到惊讶

translation.en: the World Health Organization had forewarned that it was coming.
translation.zh: 但是世界卫生组织 已经预先警告它即将到来

translation.en: I think it was a question of time.
translation.zh: 我认为这只是时间问题

translation.en: Er, we were destroying nature. We were destroying our ecosystems.
translation.zh: （玛丽亚内拉博士 世界卫生组织） 我们在破坏大自然 我们在破坏我们的生态系统

translation.en: We have been doing very aggressive agricultural practices.
translation.zh: 我们一直在进行 极具侵略性的农业活动

translation.en: We were doing an incredible, very aggressive deforestation.
translation.zh: 我们进行了一场不可思议的 毁灭性森林砍伐

translation.en: If you add to that the fact that we live in very polluted cities
translation.zh: 再加上我们生活在污染严重

translation.en: with a very high population density,
translation.zh: 人口密度很高的城市

translation.en: I think all of those elements were kind of contributing to create
translation.zh: 我认为所有这些元素

translation.en: the perfect scenario for any new virus to spread.
translation.zh: 为任何新病毒的传播 都创造了完美的场景

translation.en: [David] Zoonotic diseases emerge and spread into the human population
translation.zh: 当大自然的恢复力被削弱时

translation.en: when nature's resilience is weakened.
translation.zh: 人畜共患的疾病就会出现 并且在人群中传播

translation.en: It's not healthy nature that causes pandemics.
translation.zh: 导致大流行病的是不健康的大自然

translation.en: In terms of transmission of the diseases,
translation.zh: 在疾病的传播方面

translation.en: it's only with certain species under certain circumstances
translation.zh: 这只是在特定情况下对某些物种而言

translation.en: and when we invade their environment in a very aggressive way.
translation.zh: 而且我们是以一种极具侵略性的方式 入侵了它们的环境

translation.en: So, for the human health, animal health, and environmental health,
translation.zh: 人类健康、动物健康和环境健康

translation.en: the three are so much linked.
translation.zh: 这三者紧密相关

translation.en: Exposure to nature is good,
translation.zh: 接触大自然是好事

translation.en: provided we do not destroy nature
translation.zh: 前提是我们不去破坏

translation.en: and we not destroy the ecosystems where other species are able to live.
translation.zh: 我们也不破坏生态系统 这样其它物种才能生存

translation.en: COVID-19, I feel, has made us understand
translation.zh: 我觉得 新冠病毒

translation.en: for the first time that,
translation.zh: 第一次让我们理解了

translation.en: "Oh my God, something that goes wrong somewhere else on the planet
translation.zh: “老天 这个星球上 其他某个地方出了问题

translation.en: can suddenly hit the whole world economy
translation.zh: 会突然影响世界整体经济

translation.en: and can change my life, like, immediately."
translation.zh: 还会立刻改变我的生活”

translation.en: The appearance of COVID-19
translation.zh: 新冠毒病的出现

translation.en: was a clear warning that all is not well with our planet.
translation.zh: 是一个明确的警告 显示我们的星球一切都很糟糕

translation.en: But it's also given us an opportunity to rebuild in a new direction.
translation.zh: 但是它也给了我们一个 在新的方向重建的机会

translation.en: Now that Johan and his colleagues have turned on the headlights,
translation.zh: 现在约翰与他的同事们打开了前灯

translation.en: we can clearly see the boundaries.
translation.zh: 我们能够清晰地看到那些界限

translation.en: We can see the path back to a safe space,
translation.zh: 我们可以看到回到安全空间的路径

translation.en: to a more resilient future.
translation.zh: 通往更具韧性的未来

translation.en: It is achievable.
translation.zh: 这是可以实现的

translation.en: It's not a question anymore of doing economic growth here
translation.zh: 这不再是一个在这里做经济增长

translation.en: and then do some environmental impact reduction over here.
translation.zh: 然后再在这里做一些 减少环境影响的问题了

translation.en: Oh no, now it's a question of framing the entire growth model
translation.zh: 现在 这是围绕可持续性

translation.en: around sustainability,
translation.zh: 制定整体增长模式的问题

translation.en: and have the planet guide everything we do.
translation.zh: 让这个星球来引导我们要做的一切

translation.en: [David] An immediate priority is to reduce carbon emissions to zero
translation.zh: 当务之急是将碳排放减少到零

translation.en: and stabilize global temperature as low as we possibly can.
translation.zh: 并把全球温度稳定在尽可能低的水平

translation.en: The window is still open for us to be able to avoid passing two degrees.
translation.zh: 那扇窗还在为我们敞开着 让我们能够避免让气温超过2度

translation.en: It's even open to come to 1.5.
translation.zh: 甚至开到让我们把气温控制在1.5度

translation.en: But the window is really just…
translation.zh: 但是这扇窗真的只是…

translation.en: It's… It's barely open.
translation.zh: 勉强打开

translation.en: [David] Since the beginning of the Industrial Revolution,
translation.zh: 自从工业革命开始以来

translation.en: we have emitted 2,400 billion tons of carbon dioxide.
translation.zh: 我们已经排放了2.4万亿吨二氧化碳

translation.en: To stay below 1.5 degrees,
translation.zh: 想要把温度控制在1.5摄氏度以下

translation.en: we must emit less than 300 billion tons more.
translation.zh: 我们必须再排放 少于3000亿吨二氧化碳

translation.en: If we continue to emit 40 billion tons each year,
translation.zh: 如果我们每年的排放量是400亿吨

translation.en: our budget will run out within seven years.
translation.zh: 我们将在七年内耗尽预算

translation.en: Of course, we cannot shut down
translation.zh: 当然 我们不可能在一夜之间

translation.en: all energy utilities in the world overnight,
translation.zh: 关闭世界上所有的能源设施

translation.en: so the only orderly way to do this
translation.zh: 所以唯一有秩序的方法是

translation.en: is to bend the global curve of emissions now, because that's what all science shows.
translation.zh: 现在要改变全球的排放曲线 因为这是所有科学的研究证明

translation.en: Now is the last chance we have to bend the global curve.
translation.zh: 现在是我们改变全球曲线的最后机会

translation.en: What is the most rapid pace of emission reduction
translation.zh: 我们能够实现的最快速的

translation.en: that we can accomplish?
translation.zh: 减排速度是多少？

translation.en: Well, there's no study that suggests that we can go faster than 6, 7% per year,
translation.zh: 没有研究表明 我们可以比 每年百分之六、七的速度更快

translation.en: because 6, 7% per year, that is cutting by half in a decade.
translation.zh: 因为如果每年百分之六、七的话 那就是在十年内减少一半

translation.en: [David] Cutting our emissions in half every decade
translation.zh: 每十年将减少一半排放量

translation.en: is an exponential rate of change.
translation.zh: 是指数级的变化速度

translation.en: [Johan] Anyone can adopt this pace.
translation.zh: 任何人都可以采用这种速度

translation.en: I mean, you and I can do it as individuals.
translation.zh: 我和你可以单独行动

translation.en: We can say, "Okay, from now on, myself and my family
translation.zh: 我们可以说： “从现在开始 我和我的家人

translation.en: will try to cut emissions by half every decade,"
translation.zh: 将尝试每十年减少一半排放量“

translation.en: which would mean that you would be fossil fuel-free
translation.zh: 这意味着 你在这一代30年间

translation.en: in one generation, in 30 years' time.
translation.zh: 不使用化石燃料

translation.en: And a company can do it, or a country can do it,
translation.zh: 公司可以做到 或者国家可以做到

translation.en: or the world can/must do it.
translation.zh: 公司可以做到 或者国家可以做到 或者世界可以 也必须做到

translation.en: [David] Phasing out fossil fuels will, of course,
translation.zh: 当然 逐步淘汰化石燃料

translation.en: begin our journey back towards the safe space
translation.zh: 将开始我们回到地球界限范围内

translation.en: within the climate boundary.
translation.zh: 安全空间的旅程

translation.en: And it will also substantially reduce air pollution
translation.zh: 这将大幅减少空气污染

translation.en: and also slow down ocean acidification
translation.zh: 还能减缓海洋酸化

translation.en: as well as reduce pressure on biodiversity.
translation.zh: 以及降低对生物多样性的压力

translation.en: But zero emissions are not enough.
translation.zh: 但是零污染还是不够

translation.en: We must also draw down the carbon that's already overheating the planet,
translation.zh: 我们还必须减少 已经使地球过热的碳

translation.en: and there's one very effective way to do this.
translation.zh: 有个非常有效的方法可以做到这点

translation.en: Plant more trees.
translation.zh: 那就是多多种树

translation.en: A global effort to plant billions of trees
translation.zh: 在全球范围内种植数十亿棵树

translation.en: could be one of the most cost-effective and achievable solutions
translation.zh: 可能是解决气候危机 最具成本效益和可实现的

translation.en: to the climate crisis.
translation.zh: 解决方案之一

translation.en: And growing more trees is vital to offset the carbon we continue to emit
translation.zh: 而种更多的树对于抵消 我们继续排放的碳至关重要

translation.en: as we strive to reach zero emissions as fast as we can.
translation.zh: 因为我们正努力以最快的速度 实现零排放

translation.en: Of course, capturing carbon
translation.zh: 当然 碳捕捉

translation.en: is only one of the benefits that trees provide.
translation.zh: 只是树木提供的好处之一

translation.en: Cheikh Mbow has collaborated with Johan for many years.
translation.zh: 谢赫姆博与约翰合作了很多年

translation.en: He's an advocate for trees.
translation.zh: 他是树木的拥护者

translation.en: [in Wolof] Trees prevent soil erosion.
translation.zh: 树木能防止水土流失

translation.en: Without trees, there will be less rain.
translation.zh: 没有树木 雨水就会减少

translation.en: If we plant trees in the fields,
translation.zh: 如果我们在田地里种树

translation.en: the fertility of the fields and, therefore, production will increase.
translation.zh: 会增加田地的肥沃度 产量也会增加

translation.en: We want to bring the tree back to its place
translation.zh: 我们想让树木回到

translation.en: at the center of sustainable development.
translation.zh: 持续发展的中心位置

translation.en: Our job is to make sure that wherever a tree can grow,
translation.zh: 我们的工作是确保 在所有树木能够生长的地方

translation.en: we plant one.
translation.zh: 都种上树

translation.en: [David] Planting trees and restoring our natural world
translation.zh: 植树和恢复我们的自然世界

translation.en: will, of course, have huge benefits for our planet's biodiversity,
translation.zh: 植树和恢复我们的自然世界 当然会对我们星球的生物多样性 产生极大的好处

translation.en: but it will also help to stabilize our climate, our fresh water,
translation.zh: 它也将有助于稳定我们的气候和淡水 为我们的粮食生产和大自然

translation.en: and have enormous benefits for our food production
translation.zh: 为我们的粮食生产和大自然 免费提供的所有其他服务

translation.en: and all the other services that nature provides for free.
translation.zh: 免费提供的所有其他服务 提供巨大的好处

translation.en: Just imagine, for the first time since the dawn of humanity,
translation.zh: 试想一下 自人类诞生以来

translation.en: we could wake up one morning
translation.zh: 我们第一次早上在一个拥有

translation.en: on a planet with more wildlife than there was when we went to sleep.
translation.zh: 我们第一次早上在一个拥有 比我们睡觉时更多野生动物的 星球上醒来

translation.en: There's another transformation that is almost unbelievably simple,
translation.zh: 还有一个转变 几乎简单得令人难以置信

translation.en: but it's key to staying within our planet's boundaries.
translation.zh: 但是它是维持在 我们地球界限内的关键

translation.en: It can be adopted by you or me.
translation.zh: 你或我都可以采用

translation.en: In fact, by anyone with the freedom to choose what food they eat.
translation.zh: 事实上 任何人都可以 自由选择吃什么

translation.en: [Johan] Now, the exciting thing is the diet that is more flexitarian,
